name: Old Greenwood Lodging
description: Old Greenwood offers luxury private residences on the golf course in Truckee. Walk out your door to the first tee. Full kitchens, fireplaces, and mountain lodge living.
shortDescription: Luxury golf course residences with walk-out access to Old Greenwood Golf Course.

roomTypes.name: Mountain Lodge Room
roomTypes.description: Rustic-luxe lodge room with stone fireplace, premium bedding, and mountain views. Access to Old Greenwood's golf course and amenities.

roomTypes.name: Cabin
roomTypes.description: Private cabin with full kitchen, living area, fireplace, and deck. Perfect for families or groups wanting a home-away-from-home experience.

roomTypes.name: Townhome
roomTypes.description: Multi-bedroom townhome with full kitchen, multiple bathrooms, living and dining areas, garage, and private outdoor space.

dining.name: Twenty-Six
dining.description: Seasonal restaurant at the Old Greenwood clubhouse offering Pacific Northwest-inspired cuisine with Tahoe views.

faqs.question: Is Old Greenwood a golf resort?
faqs.answer: Yes — the Jack Nicklaus Signature golf course is steps away. Lodging guests get preferred tee times and access to the clubhouse and practice facilities.

faqs.question: What type of accommodations are offered?
faqs.answer: Mountain lodge rooms, private cabins, and multi-bedroom townhomes — from couples retreats to large group getaways.

faqs.question: How far is Old Greenwood from Truckee?
faqs.answer: About 10 minutes from downtown Truckee, 15 minutes from Northstar California, and 35 minutes from Reno-Tahoe International Airport.

meta.title: Old Greenwood Lodging Truckee | Golf Course Residences
meta.description: Luxury residences on Old Greenwood Golf Course. Walk-out access and custom golf packages.

testimonials.quote: Stayed at Old Greenwood Lodging for our golf trip and it was the perfect home base. Rooms were clean and spacious, location was ideal for hitting courses around Truckee. GTHS got us a group rate we couldn't find anywhere else.
testimonials.author: Stephanie N.

testimonials.quote: Booked Old Greenwood Lodging through Golf the High Sierra for our annual buddies trip. The group rate was excellent and having everything on one contract made logistics so simple. The property itself is well-maintained and staff was great.
testimonials.author: Sandy P.

testimonials.quote: Old Greenwood Lodging exceeded our expectations. The staff was incredibly accommodating with our group of 24 — early breakfast, late checkout, bag storage. Everything GTHS promised about this property was accurate.
testimonials.author: Jessica D.
